subject: Sales
title: Words That Change Minds
description: A quick win: understand Words That Change Minds.

hook.text: Adding one word to a request doubled compliance. The magic word was simply 'because.'

buildup.text: Ellen Langer's copy machine study proved adding 'because' makes any request more persuasive.

discovery.text: Certain words trigger automatic compliance: 'free,' 'new,' 'you,' and 'because' top every list.

twist.text: Word choice isn't trickery. It's about reducing cognitive friction for the person listening.

climax.text: The most persuasive speakers choose words that make agreement feel natural and effortless.

punchline.text: The right word at the right time changes everything.
